title: What did you do in the war Mummy? [kit]
creator_contributor_role: History Teacher's Association of Victoria, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Women in war
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1914-1918
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Australia
description: Subtitled Images of Australian women in wartime this kit aims to identify the real contribution that women made during both world wars and also at the images of women in wartime that were projected. Authored by Tim Gurry, Robert Lewis and Richard Reid, the kit draws together a wide variety of material with suggestions for its use, into nine Evidence Files, a videocassette and Teacher's notes.
